input.sentences: i spent all afternoon yesterday walking through the cemetery .
i read every headstone that i passed by .
some of them say some very sentimental things .
i came across a few that were actually meant to be funny .
most of them contained quotes and loving thoughts from family .
output.sentences: Nash loved to visit old cemeteries.
The sound of his feet crunching through the snow and the wind whistling around the stones made him feel at peace.
He wondered who the person buried here had explained how his name was actually spelled when he went to renew his liscence at the DMV.
He considered sitting on this one gravestone for a moment and then reconsidered.
He could not decide if Oak Ridge was the name of a person or the cemetery.
